original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3436)@</color>在電光火石之間連續放出三發帶有電光的箭矢，每發以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3436)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3436)@</color> Three shots of arrows with electric lights are emitted in succession between the electric light flint, each with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3436)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
